ygData.subject: Cross Research
ygData.msgSnippet: I think research and use of other classes spells is a good idea, as long as there is a penalty for doing so. It would be cool if you could learn others spells
ygData.messageBody:
I think research and use of other classes spells is a good idea, as
long as there is a penalty for doing so. It would be cool if you could learn
others spells from half your level. I.E. a level 40 wizard could learn level
20 necro spells. Or if the spells were less effective. But "jack of all
trades" mages would be very annoying. My strengths as a magician are the only
advantage I have over the other mage classes. But still....


I guess what I'm saying is cross research could be beneficial if implemented
properly. But simply any-mage-can-learn-any-spell policies would be
disasterous.

-Vorteks the High Elf Magician
